remarks: Ring multiplication operation for the constructed partial vector space A. (Contributed by NM, 11-Oct-2013.)
statement:
dvafmul.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dvafmul.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvafmul.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvafmul.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecA ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvafmul.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
dvafmul.p $e |- .x. = ( .r ` F ) $.
dvamulr $p |- ( ( ( K e. V /\ W e. H ) /\ ( R e. E /\ S e. E ) ) -> ( R .x. S ) = ( R o. S ) ) $.
